name: MythicHaikus
0:
”Alexa, open Mythic Haikus”
”Tell mythic haikus to read me a haiku”
”Ask Mythic Haikus to recite a poem”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mythic haikus
des:
Mythic Haikus delivers a randomly selected haiku poem right to your Alexa enabled device! Hear about the adventures of Thor, Zeus, Hercules, and more legendary characters from mythology across the world.

To hear a poem, simply say "Alexa, play Mythic Haikus" or "Alexa, ask Mythic Haikus to read me a poem."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
